                byte[] output,
                int outoff)
        Encodes a single octet into two hex chars.
        Parameters:
        input - the octet to encode.
        output - the array to which each encoded hex chars are written.
        outoff - the offset in the output array.

        Parameters:
        input - the input byte array
        inoff - the offset in the input array

        outoff - the offset in the output array.
